title: Ultimate Sofitel Cambodia Luxury: 2-Night Phnom Penh & 5-Night Siem Reap Stay with Daily Breakfast & Roundtrip Airport Transfers
description:
Discover the magic of Cambodia and experience a luxurious seven-night escape at two incredible five-star Sofitel residences. Enjoy five nights at Sofitel Angkor Phokeethra Golf and Spa Resort in Siem Reap - the gateway to the famous Angkor Wat - and two nights at Sofitel Phnom Penh Phokeethra - a five-star urban oasis in Cambodia’s bustling capital city - in whichever order you like. This extraordinary journey is the perfect way to delve deeper into the history of Cambodia, experience the electric thrill that comes with witnessing the grandeur of Angkor Wat and get a taste of the incredible atmosphere that fills the café-lined, art gallery and boutique filled streets of each city.

You’ll be embraced with warm hospitality and effortless French luxury throughout the entirety of your stay. When you’re ready to explore, both cities offer surprises, mysteries and sensations in abundance - visit world-class restaurants, spas and galleries in Siem Reap or fall in love with the sound of motorcycles racing through the streets while keeping your understanding of the country's past in Phnom Penh.
offer_address: 26 Old August Site Sothearos, Sangkat Tonle Bassac, Phnom Penh 12301, Cambodia

title: Ultimate Cambodia: Five-Star Siem Reap and Phnom Penh Sofitel Stays with Club Access
description: Discover Cambodia and experience a luxurious seven-night escape staying at two incredible five-star Sofitel residences. Enjoy five nights at the award-winning Sofitel Angkor Phokeethra in Siem Reap - close to the famous Angkor Wat Archaeological Park - and two nights at the Sofitel Phnom Penh Phokeethra - a five-star urban oasis in Cambodia’s capital city - in whichever order you like. Includes exclusive access to the Club Millésime, daily buffet breakfast, two 30-minute massages at the blissful spa, convenient return airport transfers, full-day tour of Angkor Wat Archaeological Park and more. Travel in even more luxury sleeping in Junior Suites at both hotels when you upgrade to a VIP Package.
offer_address: Old August Site, 26 Sothearos Boulevard, Phnom Penh 12301, Cambodia

title: Cambodia Luxury: 2-Night Phnom Penh & 5-Night Siem Reap Stay with Daily Breakfast & Tuk Tuk Angkor Wat Trip
description:
Discover the magic of Cambodia with a luxurious seven-night escape across two spectacular five-star Sofitel residences. Stay five nights at Sofitel Angkor Phokeethra Golf & Spa Resort in Siem Reap, near the iconic Angkor Wat, and two nights at Sofitel Phnom Penh Phokeethra, a serene retreat in Cambodia’s bustling capital - in whichever order you prefer.

This journey is the perfect way to delve deeper into Cambodia's history. Arrive by tuk-tuk at Angkor Wat and step into Siem Reap’s ancient stone labyrinth, where secrets echo through temple walls. Then, journey to Phnom Penh, where the hum of motorbikes fills the streets and history lingers on every corner. Surprises await in both cities, from buzzing cafes to hidden galleries and boutiques.

Experience warm hospitality and effortless French luxury throughout your stay. At Sofitel Angkor Phokeethra Golf & Spa Resort, unwind with five restaurants and bars, a sprawling lagoon-style pool, and access to an 18-hole golf course just a short drive away. In Phnom Penh, the hotel places you in the city’s beating heart, right along the riverfront.
offer_address: 26 Old August Site Sothearos, Sangkat Tonle Bassac, Phnom Penh 12301, Cambodia

vendor_name: TRIBE Phnom Penh Post Office Square
title: Contemporary Cambodia Stay in Phnom Penh with Onsite Dining & Rooftop Pool
description:
This chic hotel offers a unique blend of French heritage and traditional Khmer architecture, with a prime location along the Mekong River. Stay energised with 24/7 grab-and-go delights at TRIBE Express, take some time to unwind by the rooftop pool or hit the gym to keep up with your routine.

Beyond the hotel, explore cultural gems like the Grand Royal Palace and Wat Phnom temple, or head to the nearby Central Market, teeming with artisanal goodies and souvenirs. Lined with charming cafes and restaurants, the picturesque Sisowath Quay invites leisurely strolls.
offer_address: No. 47 Corner Street 01 And Street 94 Village 9, Phnom Penh 12021, Cambodia

title: Stylish Phnom Penh City Break near Royal Palace of Cambodia
description: Discover everything that makes Cambodia’s capital so phenomenal with a stay at Oakwood Premier Phnom Penh. Conveniently located in the vibrant business centre - just minutes from the dazzling spires of the Royal Palace of Cambodia - it’s the perfect base to experience Phnom Penh’s extraordinary collection of galleries, museums and historic buildings. Laze by the hotel’s shimmering pool or explore the city’s dazzling treasures, including the iconic Psar Thmei central market.
offer_address: Phnom Penh City Center, Oakwood Premier Building, One Park, No. 58, Street R8, 120210, Cambodia

title: Serene Cambodia Suite Escape Overlooking Mekong River
description:
Wake to stunning Mekong River views from The Balé Phnom Penh by LifestyleRetreats, a gorgeous all-suite retreat in Cambodia’s capital, awarded the 2021 Tripadvisor Travellers Choice award. Take in breathtaking views from the 30-metre swimming pool alongside the river and arrive in style as you walk across a pink sandstone walkway across a black-bottomed infinity pond into this serene haven. Spend a night dining at the resort’s Theato restaurant, where you're spoilt for choice with delicious local dishes like Mekong River lobster and rice noodles, rice porridge, and water buffalo skewers. Back in your private, high-end suite - one of just 18 - relax in the outdoor living space, soak in the bathtub and then lay your head on a sumptuous, floating king bed.

The Balé Phnom Penh by LifestyleRetreats is set in a peaceful pocket of Phnom Penh, about a thirty-minute drive to some of the city’s major sites including the Royal Palace and the Silver Pagoda.
location_description: The Balé Phnom Penh by LifestyleRetreats

title: Colonial-Inspired Luxury in the Heart of Phnom Penh with Two Pools & Spa
description:
Treat yourself to the timeless grandeur of Phnom Penh with a stay at this prestigious five-star retreat near the Royal Palace and National Museum. Blending French colonial charm, Art Deco elegance and Khmer heritage, this hotel offers plenty of charm and spacious rooms and suites in the heart of the city.

After a day of discovery, unwind with a signature Femme Fatale cocktail at the iconic Elephant Bar, or enjoy French brasserie cuisine and fine wines at Le Phnom 1929. With a luxurious spa featuring a sauna and jacuzzi, an outdoor lap pool and a prime location near Phnom Penh’s top attractions, this hotel is your gateway to Cambodia’s rich culture.
offer_address: 92 Rukhak Vithei Daun Penh, Sangkat Wat Phnom, Phnom Penh 120211, Cambodia

title: Central Phnom Penh Escape near the Mekong River with Outdoor Pool, Restaurant & Two Bars
description:
Feel the buzz of Phnom Penh from this sleek city stay, ideally positioned in the bustling Boeung Keng Kang district. This contemporary retreat offers a serene sanctuary amid the city's dynamic pulse, with a sparkling outdoor pool and tranquil day spa to help you unwind. When hunger strikes, head to the hotel's European restaurant, where you can savour a fusion of Basque, French and Spanish flavours.

Venture out to explore the city's rich history and culture, with the Royal Palace and the iconic Independence Monument just a short tuk-tuk ride away. For shopping enthusiasts, the Central Market and Aeon Mall offer a plethora of boutiques and eateries. In the late afternoon, take a stroll along the Mekong River, as the sunset illuminates Asia's most iconic waterway.
offer_address: Street 51 Corner Street 294, Boeung Keng Kang 1, Phnom Penh 120102, Cambodia

title: Cambodia Stylish Urban Oasis in the Heart of Phnom Penh
description:
Discover an oasis in the middle of Phnom Penh’s vibrant and trendy BKK1 district at Baitong Hotel & Resort. The bustle of the city fades away as soon as you step into the serene setting of this hotel resort, abundant with lush gardens, tranquil ponds, stylish public spaces, and delicious dining venues. After a day of exploring, head to the chic rooftop bar where stunning city views are perfectly accompanied by a handcrafted cocktail. Escape the heat with a dip in the gorgeous forest infinity pool, slip into the cascading waterfall jacuzzi or, for the ultimate relaxation, head to the Baitong Spa by Bodia for a massage that will transport you to another realm.

There’s so much to discover in Cambodia’s capital city, from the gilded Royal Palace and the Silver Pagoda to the myriad of markets and shopping malls. Ranked #2 of all hotels in Phnom Penh by Tripadvisor, use this stylish nature-inspired property as your launchpad into the city’s fascinating sites and history.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select packages):**

- Wake to a delicious **daily buffet breakfast** at Kuang Seafood Restaurant
- Celebrate your escape with **one cocktail or mocktail** per adult
- Relax with **one 15-minute head and shoulder massage** per adult (for stays of 3+ nights)
- One **two-course open menu lunch or dinner** at Kuang Seafood Restaurant (for stays of 5+ nights)

**Travelling with a child?** Upgrade to a Deluxe City View, Deluxe Pool View, Deluxe Garden Terrace or the Suite Room for up to two adults and one child (11 years and under), subject to availability.
offer_address: N. 10 St. 282 BKK1, Phnom Penh, Cambodia

title: Sophisticated Escape in Central Phnom Penh with Two Outdoor Pools & Spa
description:
Treasure this serene sanctuary in the heart of Phnom Penh, where timeless Khmer tradition harmonises with refined French colonial style. Ideally located near the riverfront and just steps from the Royal Palace, Independence Monument and National Museum, this hotel offers a luxurious escape in the city’s vibrant cultural core.

Relish the flavours of Italy at Do Forni, delight in refined Japanese cuisine at Hachi or indulge in global gastronomy at La Coupole, featuring live cooking stations and fresh seafood. Relax beneath swaying palms by one of two outdoor pools, or retreat to Sofitel Spa for a rejuvenating etreatment. Whether sipping a cocktail at Le Bar or exploring Phnom Penh’s rich heritage, every moment is infused with elegance and ease.
offer_address: 26 Old August Site, Sothearos Boulevard, Sangkat Tonle Bassac, Phnom Penh 12301, Cambodia
